title: Van Heusen Men's Dress Shirt Regular Fit Ultra Wrinkle Free Flex Collar Stretch Solid
description: Ultra Wrinkle Free: Advanced wrinkle-resistant fabric for less ironing and even easier care at home. Flex Collar: Stretches up to half an inch for expandable comfort. Stretch: Fabric stretches and moves with you for extra comfort.
Regular Fit: A generous cut through the shoulders, chest and waist for total comfort and a classic fit
Spread Collar: Modern traditional collar with the tips pointed outwards, allowing for tie knots of all sizes; can be worn with or without neckwear
Adjustable Cuff: Two button positions allow for a more customized, improved fit
Chest Pocket: Classic design holds all your essentials
Van Heusen Mens Dress Shirt Regular Fit Ultra Wrinkle Free Flex Collar Stretch Solid
